channel.title: WAMP on Pen-y-Fan
channel.description: Recent content in WAMP on Pen-y-Fan

item.title: How to set up Laragon on a new Windows computer (part 3) - System tray icon
item.description: Keeping the Laragon icon visible in the system tray, when minimised is helpful. In particular, it will avoid opening a new instance when one is already running.

item.title: How to set up Laragon on a new Windows computer (part 2) - permissions
item.description: Laragon needs permission to run and access through the Windows firewall

item.title: How to set up Laragon on a new Windows computer (part 1) - Install Laragon
item.description: Laragon is my developer environment of choice on Windows, this is how I set up Laragon on a new computer
